description:
Million Dollar Speaker

Verbal Aikido training is the most powerful, quick and cost effective way to enhance interpersonal relationships, increase team engagement and create a modern team culture.

This is it..... The Sixth of Seven Modules of James MacNeil's Verbal Aikido series called Mastering Communications for Ultimate Networking Success.

These videos are designed to build the trust and confidence required in order to manage the new demands of today’s organizations focusing on Network Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, Direct Sales and Businesses.

Million Dollar Presenter is a power house designed to eliminate presenter’s panic and engaging any audience in the first 10 seconds. Master creating and conveying an irresistible offer through an effective presentation.

  • Covers the Benefits and Attributes of being an effective presenter and learning the three killers of an effective presentation
  • Communication composition and why it matters. Meeting prospects where they are at and then leading them to the objective.
  • How to effectively create audience engagement and importance of interaction while display how Three Ways Credibility shows up.
  • Create your effective presentation and how to make an offer compelling using natural procession of persuasion.

In Module 6 – Million Dollar Presenter: we will be focused on the following:

  • Become a master of the stage
  • Learn the 3 pitfalls in a presentation
  • Understand the benefits of becoming a great speaker
  • Learn how to have a calm confidence in front of any crowd, regardless of size
  • What makes a great presentation and a great presenter is unveiled
  • Identify the top skills in presenting for you to work on
  • Learn the 3 Killers of an Effective Presentation
  • Magic pill to obliterate stage fright unveiled
  • Learn how to create you compelling objective
  • Learn how to set the stage
  • Create a convincing and compelling call to action
  • Understand the importance of audience engagement
  • Gain calm confidence & safe strength on the stage
  • Revisit the Natural Process of Persuasion
  • Understand the benefits and challenges related to PowerPoint
  • Review the importance of your voice and body movements during a presentation

"Mastering Communication for Ultimate Network Success" is a powerful communications and business leadership training course focused on rapidly growing your organization and maximize profits. The non-confrontational philosophy of Aikido prepares anyone to stay grounded, mentally ready and able to handle any situation or interaction regardless of the circumstances to remain empowered and in control.
title: Mastering Communications for Ultimate Networking Success #6
